name: EMD
description:
Elemental Interactive is a small indie game company that produces video games in Western Australia to reach worldwide gamers!

EMD is Elemental Interactive's first company produced video game! It is a 2D side-scrolling shoot 'em up platformer with awesome pixel cyberpunk aesthetics. EMD's story features a mass corporate power that is proliferating and expanding across the globe. Advanced industrial intelligence and technologies offer the promise of liberation but conceals perverse conspiracies for world domination. You, an aggrieved victim of these corporate lowlifes, are committed to taking them down, utilising their own ground-breaking cybernetic creations against them.

Your objective in the game is quite simple, you shoot your way through the level to make it to the end. Although a simple objective, various enemies within the game will pose a large amount of challenge. In addition, the terrain and map design also adds a low level of puzzle-like difficulty.
